document_title: Hyperuricemia: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: tang-acid-uric-mau.json_1_How much uric acid index is high?
subsection_content: According to medical experts from Medical News Today, normal uric acid levels in humans range from 1.5-7 mg/dl. The amount of uric acid in the male body will be about 1 mg/dl higher than in women. Therefore, a person has hyperuricemia when the concentration of this compound is higher than 7 mg/dl for men and 6 mg/dl for women. (2)
subsection_title: tang acid uric mau.json. How much uric acid index is high?
subsection_data:
tang acid uric mau.json. How much uric acid index is high?
According to medical experts from Medical News Today, normal uric acid levels in humans range from 1.5-7 mg/dl. The amount of uric acid in the male body will be about 1 mg/dl higher than in women. Therefore, a person has hyperuricemia when the concentration of this compound is higher than 7 mg/dl for men and 6 mg/dl for women. (2)
